news.title: Paramount Skydance launches hostile bid for WBD 'to finish what we started,' CEO Ellison tells CNBC
news.description: Netflix won a bidding war for the Warner Bros. film studio and HBO Max streaming service, but it doesn't plan to buy WBD's TV networks.

news.title: Pressure builds on Apple and CEO Tim Cook with holiday executive shake-up
news.description: Apple has seen extraordinary turnover in its top ranks over just the past week.

news.title: Former Trump lawyer Alina Habba resigns as New Jersey U.S. Attorney after disqualification
news.description: Alina Habba previously served as a defense lawyer for President Donald Trump, before being tapped to become the top federal prosecutor in New Jersey.
